page.title: 15Health in Gunton
page.content: This area, consisting chiefly of the old Gunton Estate, has no medical facilities. A Doctor lives within tree miles and there are medical practices and small Cottage Hospitals in the nearby towns. Maternity cases and serious medical cases fase a journey of up to 20 miles to the Norfolk & Norwich Hospital. Ambulances when necessary are called from Cromer 6 miles away. A considerable number of both men and women do manual work, often outdoors, and generally enjoy good health. A sewage works in Tops Hill Road serves the village of Thorpe Market and is controlled by the Anglian Water Authority. Nonagenarians are not exceptional. The population of this area is under 200 (of all ages), 60 of whom live in the Hall with a further 50 in the park.
